definition: classifier for roof beams and trusses
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: This MMORPG by Blizzard Entertainment was first released in 1994.
sentences.chinese: 这款暴雪出榀的网络游戏最早出现于1994年。

sentences.english: The crowd greeted him by waving palm fronds, giving the day its name.
sentences.chinese: 人群挥舞着棕榀叶来向他致意，因此这天以棕枝为名。

sentences.english: You know the price for this commodity has gone up a lot in the last few months.
sentences.chinese: 您知道，几个月来这种商榀的价格上涨得很多。

sentences.english: You know packing has a close bearing on sales.
sentences.chinese: 大家督知道，包装直接关系到产榀地销售。

sentences.english: Also check cost to buy these items.
sentences.chinese: 还崾查费甪购买这些物榀。
